page.title: 11School Clubs
page.content:
There is a variety of activities in the school which are run in the form of clubs.They are as follows:- Football for boys aged 7-11 Netball for girls aged 9-11 Cricket for boys aged 9-11 Hockey for girls aged 9-11 Gymnastics for mixed aged 7-11 Athletics for mixed aged 9-11 Choir for mixed aged 7-11 Recorders for mixed aged 7-11 Macrame for girls aged 9-11 Cookery for mixed aged 9-11
Each year the various school teams take part in tournaments and leagues. The school choir participates in various exhibitions and competitions. All children can take part in school outings,some of which are residential.
